name: Did you really think they'd come in peace?
name_original: Did you really think they'd come in peace?
description:
Inspired by content creator Adderly Céspedes, I decided to come up with my own version of the #FreeAppsCreatorChallenge by creating a small BulletHell Like game using only free assets, the assets I used to create this little game were:

  1. Controller Icon Pack by NullSave
  2. Sci-Fi SFX by Little Robot Sound Factory
  3. 2D Space Kit  by Brett Gregory

All the rights belong to its respective creators, I tried to focus myself on the programming needed to acomplish this project.
